body.div: JavaScript Disabled. For a better experience on this website please enable JavaScript in your browser.

p.strong: Due to the COVID-19 Pandemic, the Reading Public Schools are closed until May 4th. Be safe and practice proper hygiene and social distancing. Go to https://www.reading.k12.ma.us/covid-19-information/ for Up to Date Information.
